title: UKG Time-Off: Workforce Management
content:
To submit PTO or other leave requests, you will be utilizing the Workforce Management functionality. [INFO] UKG is a merger of a couple different HRIS platforms (Kronos, Ultipro). As a result, you’ll notice that some of its feature sets have entirely separate sites (e.g., recruiting feature set, PTO feature set, benefits/payroll feature sets). You can reach this functionality in two ways: Logging into PTO via UKG Time-Off Tile Log into Okta ( simpli.okta.com ) Select the UKG Time-Off tile within your Okta portal. [Image] It may prompt you (the first time) to enter your company code. It is simplifi. It will likely auto-launch UKG application at the same time; but it should also open the site for UKG leave requests ( https://simplifi-sso.prd.mykronos.com/ ). Follow HR’s instructions for submitting PTO requests. [NOTE] Please note, if you have a pop-up blocker, you will need to approve the opening of the UKG sites. Otherwise, the UKG Time-Off tile will not appropriately redirect. Logging into PTO via UKG Tile Log into Okta (simpli.okta.com) Select the UKG tile as . Within UKG , open the sidebar navigation menu. Select Workforce Management (between the Pay and Benefits management) [Image] Follow HR’s instructions for submitting PTO requests.
